bibl.title: The 'Alexandrian World Chronicle'. Place in the Late Antique Chronicle Traditions, Date and Historical Implications.
Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013.

bibl.note: P. Golenischev = P. Pushkin Museum Inv. 310 (= M.-P.3 2244; van Haelst 631; LDAB 6345). - Introduction. - Place in the Late Antique chronicle traditions and date. - Text. - Historical implications. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Jitse H.F. Dijkstra, The 'Alexandrian World Chronicle'. Place in the Late Antique Chronicle Traditions, Date and Historical Implications.

Tomasz Derda, Adam Łajtar & Jakub Urbanik (edd.), in cooperation with Andrzej Mirończuk & Tomasz Ochała, Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology, Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013.
